v8:item.v8:content: Family name, name, patronymic name, place of residence address, contact information - for individual; full description, location address - for legal entity;
Family name, name, patronymic name, place of residence address, contact information - for individual; full description, location address - for legal entity;
Family name, name, patronymic name, place of residence address, contact information - for individual; full description, location address - for legal entity;
Family name, name, patronymic name, place of residence address, contact information - for individual; full description, location address - for legal entity;
Shipping name of the cargo(for dangerous cargo - according to the ADR, for perishable cargo - according to ATP), its status and other necessary information about the cargo
Number of packages, labeling, packaging and form a way to pack
Net weight (gross weight) of packages in kilograms, dimensions (height, width and length) in meters, the volume of packages in cubic meters
In case of transport of dangerous cargo - information for each dangerous substance, material or product in accordance with paragraph 5.4.1 of ADR
List attached to the bill of documents lading, specified by ADR, sanitary, customs, quarantine, other regulations in accordance with the laws of the Russian Federation
List of attached to the cargo certificates, quality certificates, licenses, permits, regulations, of title and other documents that are defined by the legislation of the Russian Federation
Vehicle parameters needed to transport cargo (type, model, capacity, tonnage, etc.)
Instructions necessary for phytosanitary, sanitary, quarantine, customs and other requirements established by the legislation of the Russian Federation
Recommendations of the time limits and temperature conditions of transportation, information about locking and sealing devices (if provided by the shipper)
Date and time of submission of the vehicle for loading
Actual date and time of arriving
The actual condition of the cargo, containers, packaging, labeling and sealing
Weight of cargo, the number of packages
Date and time of submission of the vehicle for exporting
Actual date and time of arriving
The actual condition of the cargo, containers, packaging, labeling and sealing
Weight of cargo, the number of packages
Period, after which the shipper and the consignee may count cargo as lost, the form of notification for an examination to determine the amount of actual shortfall, damage of cargo

The amount of payment and the deadline of the freight storage in the carrier's terminal, terms of loading (exporting) of freight, order of providing and installing the devices required for the freight loading, exporting and transport
The freight weight and the method of its determination, information on the sealing of the closed vehicle and containers

The fine size for non picking up of the freight due to the carrier's fault, providing the transport, container out of the time, delay of the freight delivery and the order of the delay period calculation.

The font size for the failure to deliver the goods for shipment, for the delay (down time) of the transport placed for loading or exporting, for the down time of the specialized transport, for the delay (down time) of the containers
9. Information about receipt of the order (application) for execution
For the accepting of an order (application) for execution - last, first and middle name, position of a person who has accepted an order (application) for an execution
For the accepting of an order (application) for execution - last, first and middle name, position of a person who has accepted an order (application) for an execution
For the accepting of an order (application) for execution - last, first and middle name, position of a person who has accepted an order (application) for an execution
Full Name, residential address - for individual; name and place of business address - for legal party
Full Name, residential address - for individual; name and place of business address - for legal party
Last name, first name, middle name of the person in charge of the transport, data on the means of communication
Quantity, type, brand, tonnage, capacity in cubic meters
12. Reservations and remarks of the carrier (the actual status, changing of terms)
Actual state of the cargo, tare, packing, marking and sealing on the cargo reception
Actual state of the cargo, tare, packing, marking and sealing on the cargo delivering
Changing of the transportation terms at activity
Changing of the transportation terms at export
Number, date and validity of a special permission, specified route of the dangerous, heavyweight or large-size freight transport etc
Driver work and rest schedule en route, information on the commercial and other acts
Information about the person from whom the assignment for readdressing has been received (full name etc)
A new export point address, date and time of the vehicle placement for the export
On change of the objects some errors detected-changes have been canceled
15. Cost of the carrier services and the calculation order of the carriage charge
Size of the freight payment (filled after transportation) in rubles
The carrier expenses and payments for the toll roads charged from the the consignor shipper
When transiting of dangerous, heavy and bulky cargo, customs duties and fees payment,
Performing of loading and exporting works, works on washing out and disinfection of vehicles
Payment amount and lim storage period
Position of the employee who accepted the order
